DOC.brief_summary: The study is designed to answer the following questions: 1. What is the levels of visceral adiposity index and Triglycerides/HDL cholesterol ratio in hypogonadism? 2. What is the effect of testosterone replacement on the visceral adiposity index and Triglycerides/HDL cholesterol ratio?
DOC.brief_title: Visceral Adiposity Index and Triglyceride/High-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Ratio in the Congenital Hypogonadotropic Hypogonadism and Effect of Testosteron Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This is a retrospective design, which is performed by investigating the registrations of patients with hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism between the years 2007-2010.
DOC.criteria: Men Congenital hypogonadism Treatment Naive Previous history of androgen replacement Hypertension Diabetes mellitus
